title: New repository, secure master branch
body:
Thanks for creating a repository and contributing to this organization.
  In order to maintain our amazing organization standard we are enforcing the following protections on the Master branch:
  * Requiring PR reviews.
  * Dismissing stale reviews. This means existing approvals will be dismissed and have to be reapplied, when the comit on a PR changes.
  * Blocking PR merge until one of the designated code owners has offered a review.
  * Blocking PR merge until a minimum of one approval.
  * Finally, at the moment only @jamesomorodion is allowed to merge push onto the Master branch.
